items.title: Realme Buds T200: με Spatial Sound, ANC και BT 5.4 σχεδόν τσάμπα!
items.summary: Realme Buds T200 TWS earbuds offer Hi-Res Audio, ANC, 3D Spatial Sound, AI Call Noise Reduction, Bluetooth 5.4, and 50 hours of battery life at an affordable price.

items.summary: The sleepy-driver 1.1.6 is an AI-powered drowsiness detection library designed for driver safety.

items.title: All Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra configs now $220 off, or most affordable open-box model at $400+ off w/ 1-yr. warranty
items.summary: All Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra configs are currently $220 off, with the most affordable open-box model at $400+ off with a 1-year warranty. This deal has pricing starting at $979.99 shipped.

items.title: Paystand Vaults into Elite CNBC/Statista Top Global Fintech List
items.summary: Paystand has been included in CNBC/Statista's top global fintech list and is expanding blockchain technology across the Americas, solidifying its position among the world's top financial innovators.

items.title: Elucid Names Richard E. Kuntz, MD, MSc and Shamiram Feinglass, MD, MPH Board Directors
items.summary: Elucid names Richard E. Kuntz, MD, MSc and Shamiram Feinglass, MD, MPH as board directors to provide guidance for PlaqueIQTM strategy at the SCCT Annual Meeting. They are leaders in clinical, product innovation, and market access.

items.title: Zepto co-founder Kaivalya Vohra leads Avendus-Hurun India list of Under-30 entrepreneurs
items.summary: Zepto co-founder Kaivalya Vohra leads Avendus-Hurun India list of Under-30 entrepreneurs, with Zepto topping the first Avendus Wealth Hurun India 2025 Under-30 list. The list highlights the accomplishments of 79 young entrepreneurs across various sectors, with over $5 billion in funding raised.

items.title: Velocity Clinical Research Partners with Palantir to Solve Clinical Trials’ Payment Headache
items.summary: Velocity Clinical Research partners with Palantir to solve clinical trials' payment headache, marking Palantir's strategic move into the industry. Velocity is one of Palantir's first partners in this endeavor.

items.title: The Google Pixel Watch 4 is rumored to sport a bigger battery – but I'm hoping it's not just for a brighter screen and on-device AI
items.summary: The rumored Google Pixel Watch 4 is expected to have a bigger battery, potentially improving battery life for users. The leaked specs indicate a focus on longer battery life, which could be beneficial for Wear OS users.

items.title: LLMs bow to pressure, changing answers when challenged: DeepMind study
items.summary: LLMs such as GPT-4o and Google’s Gemma may change answers under pressure, raising concerns for enterprise applications that rely on multi-turn AI interactions.

items.title: Dating apps are banking on AI to win over Gen Z—but the sparks aren’t flying, survey finds
items.summary: Dating apps are relying on AI to attract Gen Z users, but a survey revealed that this generation is more hesitant to embrace AI in the dating realm.

items.title: India Asset Management – Key drivers and trends (Anusha Sivaramakrishnan)
items.summary: The Indian asset management industry has witnessed remarkable growth over the past decade, with increasing investments and advancements in technology. AI is expected to be a key driver for further growth and efficiency within the industry.

items.title: AI Maverick Launches Enhanced Prospecting Platform to Deliver Human-Like Outreach–No SDR Team Required
items.summary: AI Maverick launches enhanced prospecting platform to deliver human-like outreach without requiring an SDR team.

items.title: OpenAI Seeks Piece of ChatGPT-Driven eCommerce Sales
items.summary: OpenAI is seeking a portion of eCommerce sales driven by ChatGPT in an effort to expand their business.

items.title: TSMC announced a blowout quarter due to AI and provided an update on their new 2nm plants with even more advanced plants set for Arizona
items.summary: TSMC reported a blowout quarter attributed to AI, with updates on new 2nm plants in Arizona and plans for even more advanced chips.

items.title: What is GEO vs SEO and why it matters now
items.summary: As AI tools like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Claude become the new search engines, a new kind of optimization is emerging: GEO — Generative Engine Optimization.

items.title: The AI Bubble Today Is Bigger Than the IT Bubble in the 1990s
items.summary: The AI bubble today is bigger than the IT bubble in the 1990s, with the top 10 companies leading the charge.

items.title: Trust is Tech Mahindra’s currency, and deep understanding of AI is its edge: Anand Mahindra
items.summary: Trust and deep understanding of AI are highlighted by Tech Mahindra's Chairman Anand Mahindra as crucial for navigating global uncertainties. The company is committed to responsible AI implementation for measurable returns, emphasizing resilience and trust as key factors.

items.title: anosys-agentic-ai-package 0.0.5
items.summary: AnoSys-agentic-AI-package 0.0.5 is a helper package designed to support easy implementation to the AnoSys platform. This tool aids in streamlining the process of integrating AI functionalities into existing systems.

items.title: Nvidia's Jensen Huang Says China Leads In Open-Source AI
items.summary: Nvidia's Jensen Huang acknowledges China's leading role in open-source AI innovation during a fireside chat with Alibaba Group Cloud founder Wang Jian at the China International Supply Chain Expo.

items.title: How Republicans Can Prove They're Serious About the National Debt | Opinion
items.summary: Republicans need to prove they are serious about the national debt, which is currently at $37 trillion, before their control of Congress and the White House is compromised.

items.title: TSMC posts 60% jump in record quarterly profit, but wary about U.S. tariffs
items.summary: TSMC, a major producer of AI chips, reported a 60% increase in quarterly profit but expressed concerns about future income being impacted by U.S. tariffs.

items.title: Synopsys acquires simulation specialist Ansys for $35 billion following Chinese regulator approval — Merger to power end-to-end design platform
items.summary: Synopsys acquires simulation specialist Ansys for $35 billion following Chinese regulator approval, creating a powerful end-to-end design platform that raises competitive and geopolitical concerns.

items.summary: The AI-powered drowsiness detection library, sleepy-driver 1.1.2, has been developed for driver safety. This innovation aims to help prevent accidents caused by drowsy driving.

items.title: Stagwell Wins Heaven Hill Spirits’ Integrated Account
items.summary: Stagwell has been chosen as the agency of record for Heaven Hill Spirits' integrated account, including a 10-brand spirits portfolio, following a competitive review.

items.title: Transforming SAP Implementations to Meet Evolving Customer Expectations
items.summary: RISE with SAP Validated Partner recognition allows partners to leverage SAP Business Suite power in transforming SAP implementations to meet changing customer expectations.

items.title: Minnesota tragedy reveals how data brokers sell your personal information
items.summary: Minnesota tragedy highlights the dangers of data brokers selling personal information, with the $200 billion industry tracking individuals across websites. Privacy risks can be minimized with data removal services.

items.title: Perplexity CEO's warning to startups: big tech will "copy anything that's good"
items.summary: Perplexity CEO warns startups that big tech will copy innovative ideas, emphasizing the need for commitment and hard work in the face of opportunities and risks.

items.summary: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold anticipated to outperform Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7, with Google finding advantages for their upcoming foldable phone despite improvements made by Samsung.

items.summary: Nvidia's selling AI chips to China as part of rare earths talks, according to Reuters.

items.title: Europe assumes financial burden of Ukraine war, angering Russia
items.summary: Europe assuming financial burden of Ukraine war leads to anger from Russia, Trump sees European purchases of US weapons as a victory, while UN warns of record civilian casualties.

items.summary: Microsoft Edge 138.0.3351.95 is a free web browser based on the Chromium Open Source project and other Open Source software.

items.title: ‘Just ridiculous,’ says Google Brain founder on hype about AI taking away all jobs, shares tips how anyone can become powerful
items.summary: Andrew Ng, a prominent AI expert, dismisses the excessive hype surrounding Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and advises focusing on mastering existing tools for practical applications.

items.title: Teacher Retirement System of Texas Purchases New Position in Upstart Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:UPST)
items.summary: Teacher Retirement System of Texas purchased a new stake in Upstart Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:UPST) in the 1st quarter, acquiring 11,947 shares of the company's stock valued at approximately $550,000.

items.title: Metaverse Stocks To Keep An Eye On – July 15th
items.summary: Metaverse stocks such as NVIDIA, Accenture, and Globant are recommended to watch as they are companies involved in building, enabling, or monetizing immersive digital environments for user interaction via avatars.

items.title: Samsung's boss escapes prison, but can he escape the market slump?
items.summary: Samsung's boss escapes prison, but faces challenges in navigating the market slump.

items.title: Congress Should Reject Cryptocurrency Double Standard | Opinion
items.summary: Congress is being urged to implement new ethics rules preventing the president from issuing or owning digital assets like cryptocurrency during discussions on regulating digital assets.

items.title: Chiratae-backed Uniphore Technologies in talks to raise up to $250 million
items.summary: Chiratae-backed Uniphore Technologies is in talks to raise up to $250 million to fuel global expansion and deepen its AI bets.

items.title: American firms in China report record-low new investment plans for 2025, and doubts about their profitability
items.summary: American firms in China are reporting record-low new investment plans for 2025 due to doubts about profitability and negative effects from U.S. export control measures, with many facing lost sales and reputational damage as unreliable suppliers.

items.title: New Kiro AI IDE Released by Amazon with Free Claude 4 Access for Limited Time
items.summary: Amazon has released a new AI IDE called Kiro, which aims to streamline the coding process by acting as a personal assistant. The tool comes with free access to Claude 4 for a limited time, offering developers assistance with tedious tasks.

items.title: ChatGPT Plus Gets Record Mode on Mac for Meeting Transcription
items.summary: OpenAI expands access to Record Mode in ChatGPT for macOS, allowing Plus subscribers to use AI-powered transcription feature initially rolled out to business users last month.

items.title: aiyt 0.4.4
items.summary: The latest version of aiyt AI tool, 0.4.4, can transcribe, chat, and summarize YouTube videos using AI technology.

items.title: 『2030年の営業 組織の知×AIで生き残る』7月1９日発売｜出版記念ウェビナーを7月24日開催――AI時代に「ヒトらしさ」で成果を生む営業組織とは？
items.summary: A new book titled '2030年の営業 組織の知×AIで生き残る' discusses how sales organizations can survive in the AI era by combining human skills with AI. A webinar celebrating the book's release will be held on July 24th, exploring how sales organizations can leverage 'humanity' to achieve success in the age of AI.

items.summary: Anthropic draws investor interest at more than $100 billion valuation after earlier round led by Lightspeed Venture Partners.

items.title: mseep-ailice added to PyPI
items.summary: AIlice, a fully autonomous AI agent, has been added to PyPI. The project aims to create an artificial intelligence assistant similar to JARVIS based on the open-source LLM.

items.title: BTC Mining Has Gone Mobile, PFMCrypto Launches Mobile-Based BTC Cloud Mining Platform for Global Users
items.summary: BTC mining startup PFMCrypto launches mobile-based cloud mining platform for global users, offering seamless earnings, AI-optimized contracts, and 24/7 global access.

items.title: NVIDIA CEO makes third visit to China this year as H20 AI chip sales resume
items.summary: NVIDIA CEO makes third visit to China as H20 AI chip sales resume, targeting the Chinese market. Company also launched a new RTX Pro GPU for smart factories and logistics applications.
